Question
========

For two events X and Y, P(X) = 0.7 and P(Y) = 0.2. The events X and Y never occur at the same time. This means that X and Y

Answerlist
----------

* Are complementary.
* Be disjoint but not independent.
* Be independent but not disjoint (disjoint).

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Be complementary Incorrect
* Be disjoint (disjoint) but not independent...: Correct
* Be independent but not disjoint (disjoint)...: Incorrect
